Deadly Weapon.definition: an object whose purpose is to cause death or that when used as an instrument of offense is capable of causing death or sometimes serious bodily harm compare dangerous weapon NOTE

1.1: an object whose purpose is to cause death or that when used as an instrument of offense is capable of causing death or sometimes serious bodily harm compare
1.note: An unloaded firearm has been generally held to be a deadly weapon. Although usually distinct, the termsdeadly weaponanddangerous weaponare sometimes used interchangeably.
